meanings.definition: A small fish or potato that is the size of a finger.
meanings.sent1: The chef used fingerlings to make a delicious potato salad.
meanings.sent2: I caught some fingerlings while fishing in the pond.
meanings.sent3: The fingerlings in the aquarium seemed to be having a tiny party.
meanings.sent4: The farmer planted fingerlings in neat rows like little soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering fingerlings darted playfully in the water.

meanings.definition: A young child or animal that is small enough to fit on a finger.
meanings.sent1: The tiny kitten was so small it looked like a fingerling in the palm of my hand.
meanings.sent2: She adored playing with the fingerlings at the petting zoo.
meanings.sent3: The fingerlings in the pet store were all dressed up in tiny costumes.
meanings.sent4: The baby squirrel was a fingerling clinging to the tree branch.
meanings.sent5: The giggling fingerlings ran around the playground with joy.
